aboutText: Hi, I'm Aarnav Sanghvi, a very cool UI/UX Designer who loves to combine my professional and personal passions. With over 5 years of professional experience in the field, I specialize in crafting user experiences that are both aesthetically pleasing and functional. My expertise lies in coding with CSS and Tailwind, and I'm always looking for ways to improve my skills. Outside of work, I'm an avid hiker, reader, and snowboarder, and I love to use my hobbies to inform my design techniques and stay inspired. With a combination of my professional and personal experiences, I'm confident that I can create engaging and impactful digital solutions for any project.

projects.name: MessagingApp
projects.desc: A project that contains a server, as well as a client application for two clients to chat via tcp

projects.name: next-seo
projects.desc: Next SEO is a plug in that makes managing your SEO easier in Next.js projects.
